all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
For the word of the Lord is truth, and whatsoever is truth is light, and whatsoever is light is Spirit, even the Spirit of Jesus Christ.
Doctrine and Covenants 84:45
Quote of the Day
"The love our friends feel among us will lift them closer to Jesus Christ!"
Elder Dieter F. Uchtdorf | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
